author: palladia
body: Modified the 3 pending tests: 1. Use $PsHome to determine full path of PowerShell. 2. Exceptions do not propagate between applications. So capture output and compare with expected exception message. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/879)

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @palladia I rebased onto master to pull in xUnit test fixes.

title: Modify Set-PSBreakpoint.Tests.ps1 and fix 3 pending tests
